newsitem.title: USA: Wellco Enterprises expects Q3 loss.
newsitem.headline: Wellco Enterprises expects Q3 loss.

text.p: Wellco Enterprises Inc said Tuesday it expects a loss in its third quarter as a result of a delay in receiving a five-year contract from the the U.S. Defense Personnel Support Center for combat boots.
Combat boot sales to DPSC are the most significant source of Wellco revenues.

Although the company has sold boots to DSPC in the past, the bidding process is competitive, and management said it cannot state with absolute certainty that Wellco will receive a contract award or what percent it will be awarded.
